thread.title: Kenya: Health Staff in Kiambu Strike
thread.title_full: Kenya: Health Staff in Kiambu Strike

title: Kenya: Health Staff in Kiambu Strike
text:
By Stanley Njenga kiambu Level 4 Hospital health workers went on strike yesterday over nonpayment of their September salaries. Speaking in Kiambu town, branch civil servants' chairperson Loise Mbitiru said the health workers will not work unless they get their salaries. She said the county government had promised their salaries would not be delayed further after they demonstrated in August over the same issue. "We hear other health workers have been paid and last month we had the same issue of late salary payment now the health workers have vowed not to go back to work," Mbitiru said. Kenya
